1.content: Fix mobile responsiveness issues causing test timeouts
1.details: 1. Debug mobile viewport crashes and timeouts. 2. Fix mobile navigation visibility and functionality. 3. Ensure mobile layouts work properly across all pages. 4. Test mobile user journeys manually and with automation.

2.details: 1. Add required field validation for business registration. 2. Implement email format validation. 3. Add terms and conditions checkbox. 4. Create business category selection. 5. Add success/error confirmation messages. 6. Test complete registration flow.

3.details: 1. Add missing contact information display. 2. Implement ratings and reviews sections. 3. Add key consultant metrics (experience, pricing). 4. Fix tab navigation on profile pages. 5. Ensure all profile data displays correctly.

4.details: 1. Complete review form validation. 2. Fix rating system interaction issues. 3. Implement review submission confirmations. 4. Add review display and sorting functionality. 5. Test complete review workflow.

5.details: 1. Add data-testid attributes for reliable test targeting. 2. Fix fragile text-based selectors. 3. Improve test stability and reduce flakiness. 4. Update test configurations for better reliability.

6.content: Re-run comprehensive test suite to validate fixes
6.details: 1. Execute all 47 tests after implementing fixes. 2. Verify pass rate improvement from 40.4% to 100%. 3. Generate final test report. 4. Confirm all critical functionality works correctly.
